text: Cristiano Marques Gomes (born 3 June 1977), or simply Cris, is a Brazilian football manager and former player who was most recently manager of French Championnat National club Versailles. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Corinthians 1995 Série A 2 0 – 0 0 – 2 0 1996 Série A 0 0 – 3 1 – 3 1 1997 Série A 9 0 – 0 0 – 9 0 1998 Série A 15 0 – 0 0 – 15 0 1999 Série A 0 0 – 4 0 – 4 0 Total 26 0 0 0 0 0 7 1 0 0 33 1 Cruzeiro 1999 Série A 12 0 – 0 0 – 12 0 2000 Série A 22 3 – 5 1 – 27 4 2001 Série A 19 3 – 13 1 – 32 4 2002 Série A 25 3 – 0 0 – 25 3 2003 Série A 31 3 – 1 0 – 32 3 2004 Série A 13 1 – 8 1 – 21 2 Total 122 13 0 0 0 0 27 3 0 0 149 16 Bayer Leverkusen (loan) 2002–03 Bundesliga 2 0 1 0 – 4 0 – 7 0 Lyon 2004–05 Ligue 1 33 3 3 0 0 0 9 2 – 45 5 2005–06 Ligue 1 36 3 4 1 0 0 10 1 – 50 5 2006–07 Ligue 1 32 4 4 0 1 1 7 0 – 44 5 2007–08 Ligue 1 13 1 3 0 0 0 1 0 – 17 1 2008–09 Ligue 1 34 2 3 0 1 1 6 0 – 44 3 2009–10 Ligue 1 34 4 1 0 1 0 14 0 – 50 4 2010–11 Ligue 1 20 1 1 0 0 0 5 0 – 26 1 2011–12 Ligue 1 20 2 2 0 2 0 4 0 – 28 2 2012–13 Ligue 1 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 3 0 Total 224 20 21 1 5 2 56 3 1 0 307 26 Galatasaray 2012–13 Süper Lig 10 1 0 0 – 1 0 – 11 1 Grêmio 2013 Série A 3 0 – 7 0 – 10 0 Vasco da Gama 2013 Série A 24 1 – 0 0 – 24 1 Career total 411 35 22 1 5 2 102 7 1 0 541 45 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Brazil 2001 8 0 2002 3 1 2004 4 0 2006 1 0 2009 1 0 Total 17 1 === International goals === #
